code: import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import React from"react";import{XYPlot,XAxis,YAxis,HorizontalGridLines,VerticalBarSeries,ChartLabel}from"react-vis";function Studentpage(_ref){var data=_ref.data;var studentdata=data;var nameInUrl=window.location.pathname.split("/")[2];console.log(nameInUrl);var studentevaluation=studentdata.filter(function(item){return item.name===nameInUrl;});var funNumbers=studentevaluation.map(function(assignment){return assignment.funfactor;});var difficultyNumbers=studentevaluation.map(function(assignment){return assignment.difficulty;});var funFactorData=funNumbers.map(function(y,index){return{x:index,y:y};});var difficultyData=difficultyNumbers.map(function(y,index){return{x:index,y:y};});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"".concat(nameInUrl,"'s evaluation of the assignments")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"Chart",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(XYPlot,{height:400,width:1350,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HorizontalGridLines,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(VerticalBarSeries,{className:"funfactor",color:"#c99da3",data:funFactorData}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(VerticalBarSeries,{className:"difficulty",data:difficultyData}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(XAxis,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(YAxis,{className:"funfactor"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(YAxis,{className:"difficulty"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ChartLabel,{text:"Assignments",className:"alt-x-label",includeMargin:false,xPercent:0.025,yPercent:1.01}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ChartLabel,{text:"Funfactor & difficulty",className:"alt-y-label",includeMargin:false,xPercent:0.06,yPercent:0.06,style:{transform:"rotate(-90)",textAnchor:"end"}})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"funcheckbox",children:"funfactor"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"difficultycheckbox",children:"difficulty"})]});}export default Studentpage;
